trans-unit.source: Represents a base class for data source controls.

The ContextDataSource class is a base class that can be used to create any data source control that supports the Entity Framework, LINQ-to-SQL, [!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/add/includes/vstecado-md.md)] Data Services, or other data provider.
The ContextDataSource class is derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource>.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource> class provides a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContextDataSource.ContextTypeName%2A> property that represents the context type that the data source control works with.
For example, the context type for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> class is the <xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext> object.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContextDataSource"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the name of the object that contains the property to retrieve data from.
The name of the object that contains the property to retrieve data from.
Gets or sets the name of the property or field in the data source object that represents a data collection.
The name of the property or field in the data source object that represents a data collection.
Gets or sets the name of the type that is created for Insert, Delete, and Update operations.
The name of the type that is created for Insert, Delete, and Update operations.
